medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset right lower quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient woke up around 2 AM today with diffuse lower abdominal pain and bloating, followed by anorexia. Symptoms worsened a few hours prior to ED presentation, when the pain became more localized to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hydrocele repair at age 28; otherwise no significant past medical history.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of gastrointestinal disorders and cancers.
